extendedInfo.description: *** NOTE, there has been an issue with Avast and other anti-virus software that flagged us as containing a Trojan.  This is a false positive and we have filed a claim with Avast to get this resolved.  They have scanned our software and found it to be clean, we are just waiting for the virus definition files to update.  Sorry for the inconvenience. ***FishFarts Kids is the popular "Kids' Mode" from the full FishFarts game.  In this free version, your child (or you!) can pop bubbles and fart the fish all day long.  There is no time limit, no 'missed' bubbles... just simple fun and absolutely NO third party advertisements for your child to click on.In this version of FishFarts, there are no penalties for clicking fish and the game never ends.If you enjoy FishFarts Kids, then you'll love the full FishFarts game... and it's not just for kids! The full version of FishFarts boasts three different game modes with three difficulty settings each.  Your highest scores are saved and you have the option to brag about your latest score on Facebook.  And not to worry, the FishFarts Kids mode is also included in the full game.  So if you are looking for a challenge or simply wish to support our development, download the full version of FishFarts!Both FishFarts and FishFarts Kids have been receiving a lot of great reviews and tons of video reviews on Youtube! Thanks for the responses!Lisa *****Simple enough for a toddler My two year old was literally ROFLing when she tried this. It's cute and easy enough for a toddler to use. Good job on making an app easy enough for a toddler to understand and use.Ted *****Hilarious My son and I laugh so hard together when he plays this don't know who is having more fun him or me!Crystal *****This game is so much fun. It keeps my children laughing while waiting at the Dr.'s office and long car rides. It's gassy but fun!Jennifer *****This is great! My two year old loves this app! Its funny and great for her fine motor skills!Christy *****A must have game for kids. Especially if u have boys! Any age guarantee they will laugh :DFishFarts Full:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kansysapps.fishfarts&feature=nav_other#?t=W251bGwsMSwyLDYsImNvbS5rYW5zeXNhcHBzLmZpc2hmYXJ0cyJdFollow us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kansys-Apps/151711088224152Follow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/#!/KansysApps

reviews.title: Amazing all ages
reviews.comment: My 2 year old daughter love it. I caught my wife and her dad playing it two :p love the new fish keep it coming
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: my kid loves it!
reviews.comment: What\'s not to like? My 2 year old is entertained for a few precious moments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extreme fun for 2 year olds
reviews.comment: It may not work out for everyone. But I definitely recommend it. It\'s a lot of fun for 2 year olds, and also improves fine motor skills and reaction.
reviews.author: Guy M

reviews.title: Funny
reviews.comment: Who knew when you add a 3 year old and farting fish. It equals hours of fun!!  Just watching her makes me laugh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for xoom
reviews.comment: This crashed my xoom today. This does not work with the xoom. It froze twice after trying to open it and the system rebooted thank god. Going to be unistalling it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: My 2yr old loves this game just wish there was a lock on it so he could get out if it as easily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sound
reviews.comment: i loaded this game but soon after all sound would go off on my phone at random.  I\'d have to reboot my phone to get sounds back, including my ringer. I\'ve installed it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: thanks to the funny sound effect it\'s an enjoyable game but the small fishes are hard to tap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: easy playing good fun
reviews.comment: In the words of my nearly 3 year old \'This makes me feel very smiley\'
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost great.
reviews.comment: Would of given 5 stars but there is no end to the game...you can\'t win!!
reviews.author: Emily Nutting

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: This worked great until about 2 weeks ago, started locking up my Android 3.2 Xoom during the game.  Yesterday it would lock it up as soon as you clicked the icon.  Got the ICS upgrade today and it does the same thing.  Uninstalled, kids are sad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Highly Recommended
reviews.comment: My 6 & 8yo love this game. It\'s easy enough for a baby to play, yet funny enough to entertain older kids for a while. Worth downloading.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So great
reviews.comment: Because there is no pop up advertising. I dont have to exit out every 5 minutes because an advertising. My 2 year old can do it and thinks its funny
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My kids love
reviews.comment: The only reason it got 4 stars instead of 5 stars is because sometimes the fish don respond.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pure happiness. Lol I got 601 fish and 331 bubbles. Amazing fun a must. Try
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Giggles
reviews.comment: Huge giggles for little kids my 2 laugh there heads off at it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could have a few features added
reviews.comment: My 2 yr old son loves it but I wish it had a child lock and also made to where he could be touching the screen at the same time as he was touching the fish/bubbles..you can\'t have a finger or nothing on the screen when touchinjg fish/bubbles..if you do they won\'t do anything...plz add those two things and I\'ll give a better rating...
reviews.author: Bridgett Andrews

reviews.comment: My 4 year old daughter gets a kick out of this game! Keeps her entertained and loves to play! Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Verry funny!
reviews.comment: This is such a cute game for children. It will keep them entertained!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: My boys love this game. They laugh an giggle the hole time an its really easy for them.
reviews.author: A Google User
